name: update_individual_supplier_details
delete_individual_supplier_details
script:
if doc.parent_supplier:
    doc_name = frappe.db.get_value('Individual Supplier Details',{'supplier_name':doc.name},'name')
    frappe.get_doc(dict(
        doctype = 'Individual Supplier Details',
        parent = doc.parent_supplier,
        name = doc_name
    )).delete()
